channel.title: IETF Applications Area Working Group APP Working Group-relevant MDN issues
channel.description: Issue filed on MDN Web Docs related to pages attached to technologies developed by IETF Applications Area Working Group APP Working Group

item.title: [rfc7239] http.headers.Forwarded - The example looks incorrect
item.content:encoded:
What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

In the example below, it shows the UPV6 for X-Forwarded-For header within brackets. I believe that is incorrect for X-Forwarded-For but correct for the Forwarded header:

X-Forwarded-For: 192.0.2.43, "[2001:db8:cafe::17]"
Forwarded: for=192.0.2.43, for="[2001:db8:cafe::17]"

What did you expect to see?

X-Forwarded-For: 192.0.2.43, 2001:db8:cafe::17
Forwarded: for=192.0.2.43, for="[2001:db8:cafe::17]"

MDN page report details
  • Query: http.headers.Forwarded
  • MDN URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Forwarded
  • Report started: 2021-06-29T20:52:07.834Z
